title: Do teachers like remote learning? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. I don’t. While it’s a whole lot easier to just post material online for students to do my students are not getting a good education out of it. It’s the educational equivalent of putting your finger in the dam to keep the town from flooding. I can’t read the room, I can’t converse, I can’t help those who are having a hard time by varying my lesson as needed. Many I know feel the same way. We miss out students.
